title: Well defined Dashboard
content: Allows the user to check their investments and balance in real time.

title: Wallet Management
content: Allows the user to top up their wallet and withdraw funds from their wallet.

title: Dashboard based on User's Portfolio
content: A dynamic dashboard that shows your portfolio in a visually appealing way.

title: Real Time Stock Data
content: Get real time stock data for your portfolio and chart performance over different time periods.

title: Invest in varied assets
content: Invest in both Indian and U.S. stock market and crypto currency [Coming Soon].
